column2: "Thanks! This is it, yes. This cross-section sure does produce a fairly stimulating fragrance, doesn't it?"

"Hm... I wonder how I'm going to use this
new seasoning. I can't wait to experiment!"

"Here you go, <%me>,
your reward for this one. I may have more
requests, so until then, good-bye!"

"ありがとーう！　これよ、これ。
確かに断面から、ほんのり
刺激的な香りがただよってるわね。"

"一体どんな調味料に仕上がるのか
今から調理するのが楽しみだわ！"

"<%me>さん
これ今回のお礼。
また何かあったらよろしくね！"
